title: Human postnatal donor
description: Schema for submitting a postnatal human donor.

age_units.comment: Age units is required if age is specified as anything but unknown.

twin_type.comment: Twin type could be specified only if twin sibling is specified.

times_pregnant.title: Times pregnant
times_pregnant.description: Number of pregnancies of the donor.

living_at_sample_collection.title: Living at sample collection
living_at_sample_collection.description: If true, the donor was alive at the time of sample collection.

family_history_breast_cancer.title: Family history breast cancer
family_history_breast_cancer.description: Familial relations with history of breast cancer.

items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers.

smoking_history.title: Smoking history
smoking_history.description: Assessment of smoking history in the form # unit per time frame over length of time in years smoked and since cessation. E.g. 1 pack a day for 10 years. 2 years since cessation.

alochol_history.title: Alcohol history
alochol_history.description: Assessment of alcohol use in the form # unit per time frame. E.g. 2 drinks a day.

cause_of_death.title: Cause of death
cause_of_death.description: Description of medical/accidental cause of death of the donor. Leave blank if the donor is living.

body_mass_index.title: Body mass index
body_mass_index.description: Body mass index as defined by weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters.

height.title: Height
height.description: Measurement of height of donor at the time of biosample collection.

height_unit.title: Height unit
height_unit.description: Units of measurement of height of donor at the time of biosample collection.

test_results.title: Test results
test_results.description: The results from any test to measure the donor's health in the format of key (test name):value (test results)
